response.original_title: Необычайные похождения Диего Диеговича в стране большевиков. Диего Ривера. Русский след
response.overview: The fate of the famous Mexican muralist Diego Rivera is closely linked to Russia: Russian artists Angelina Belova and Maria Vorobyova-Stebelskaya gave birth to his children, for a long time he was a friend of Leon Trotsky, joined the Communist Party several times, was friends with progressive figures of young Soviet art. It was to Soviet Russia that he came in the last years of his life in the hope of recovering from a serious illness…
response.title: The Unusual Adventures of Diego Diegovich in the Country of the Bolsheviks

titles.title: Необычные похождения Диего Диеговича в стране большевиков
